abstract: Golf's ruling body the R&A, along with the United States Golf Association, amends nine principal regulations of the Rules of Golf, the bible of the game; changes, which impact everyone from tour professionals to municipal golfers, do not fundamentally change the game but ease some penalties and remove ambiguity.
snippet: The R&A, golf’s ruling body in much of the world, and the United States Golf Association amended nine principal regulations of the Rules of Golf, the bible of the game.
lead_paragraph: The R&A, golf’s ruling body in much of the world, and the United States Golf Association amended nine principal regulations of the Rules of Golf, the bible of the game.

headline.main: Change 267 Years in Making: A Tweak in the Rules of Golf
headline.print_headline: Change 267 Years in Making: A Tweak in the Rules of Golf
headline.seo: Golf Adjusts Some Penalties, and It Only Took Centuries
